#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define pl pair<long long,long long>
#define pb push_back
#define eps 1e-12
using namespace std;
ll a[1000004];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	ll n,x;
	cin>>n;
	ll ans=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>x;
		a[x]++;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
	{
		ans=ans+((a[i]*(a[i]-1))/2ll);
	}
	ans=((n*(n-1))/2ll)-ans;
	cout<<ans<<"\n";
}
